description: Hourly demand forecasts aggregated at the distribution center (DC) level. Each row represents forecasted demand for a DC at a specific forecast horizon.

dc_id.description: Unique identifier of a distribution center. DC IDs encode geographic location and facility role. Location names are embedded as substrings within dc_id.
dc_id.location_encoding: dc_id contains uppercase city or region names (e.g., DUBAI, KSA, UAE)
semantic_hints: User-provided locations should be matched using substring
If multiple DCs match, return all relevant rows
Never use equality match for dc_id

timestamp.description: Base timestamp representing when the forecast was generated.

forecast_hour_offset.description: Hour offset from timestamp indicating how many hours ahead the demand is forecasted.

predicted_demand.description: Forecasted demand quantity for the distribution center.
